Text.val: // author: Peter van der Veen, created 17.07.2001
27.08.2014 SH SCR19032 Added BPH101.PI.SKIP_DATABASE_UPDATES (parameter is skipped)
04.07.2014 SH SCR19007 Added update new TMPJ fields (TMPJ_AMOUNTDESKTOPCURR, TMPJ_AMOUNTCREDITCURR)
29.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
02.05.2011 SH SCR16387 Replaced BPH122 by GB902
02.05.2011 JOH SCR16385 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
and GB002 by GB902
18.04.2011 GB SCR16390 Changed condition for call the GB002
14.12.2010 SH SCR16057 Added BPH102.PI.TYPEOFDRAFTS = 0
27.07.2010 SH SCR15678 Added Part 0 Check direct payment and added
BPH102.PI.RCVDFROMCLIENT (only relevant for positiv amounts)
08.09.2009 SH SCR14771 Added test BPH101.PO.PAYMENTINBATCH <> Y to skip part 2
"Payments which must be on the administration desktop", those payments can be
booked as intercredit
04.08.2009 SH SCR14771 Added BPH101.PO.PAYMENTINBATCH (not used)
28.12.2008 GB SCR14266 Removed part with update BMOD
13.02.2006 SH SCR10383 Part 3 Splitted part to book positive/negative payments
amounts separately with BPH102
20.01.2006 SH SCR10161 Added test BNKA_CODETYPEACCOUNT <> 5 to check if
payments must be on the administration desktop
19.12.2005 SH SCR9834 Added BPH122 to calc PI.AMOUNTCLIENTCURR for BPH102
and added storing of TMPJ_AMOUNTEXCHDIFFERENCE
15.12.2005 AK SCR9803 BADP_PAYMENTVALUEDATE to list of arguments for BPH101
05.12.2005 SH SCR9683 Added PO.CHQE_ID to argument list of BPH101, not in used
28.11.2005 SH SCR9555 BPH223 Fixed bug with update of
v.GNRL_PAYMVALDAYSAREWORKDAYS, was always empty
05.10.2005 SH SCR9225 BPH223 Removed test on sum (BADP_AMOUNTACCCURR) <> 0
to perform the module
09.08.2005 SH SCR8755 BPH223B Extended update of PI.NUMBEROFDAYS for BPH126
if BNKA_NVALDAYSPAYMENT > 0
26.07.2005 SH SCR8547 Added new arguments to list for BPH102, both skipped
12.07.2005 SH SCR8544 BPH223B Added new arguments to call of BPH112
30.06.2005 SH SCR8615 Part 2 BADP_ADMNOINITIAL/CLNTNOINITIAL set only to 0 now
if GSET_YESNO = 'Y' (GSET_ID=108)
30.06.2005 SH SCR8548 Changed test to perfrom part 2 from BADP_AMONTACCCURR < 0
to BADP_AMONTACCCURR < GSET_AMOUNT (GSET_ID=106)
21.04.2005 SH SCR 8163 Add new argument PI.BADT_DATLASTDAILYSTATEMENT
for call of BPH224
07.04.2005 SH SCR8072 BPH223B Extended condition (part 2) to perform part 2 with
"and GSET_CODEDICTIONARYNUM = 0" (where GSET_ID = 87)
21.03.2005 SH SCR7950 Restructured module BPH223B
18.03.2005 SH SCR7950 Added new CND to book payment by administration department
--> or PO.LEDGER = 0 and BADP_AMOUNTCOSTSACCCURR > 0
28.09.2004 SH SCR7089 Added new argument for BPH102 -> PI.BADP_ID = 0
20.08.2004 SH SCR6809 Added new para BADT_MUTDAILYSTATEMENTS for call
to BPH224
07.05.2004 SH SCR6190 Extended 2. part of CND to book payment by administration
department with "and PO.LEDGER = 0"
05.04.2004 SH SCR5891 Changed calc of v.CLIENTVALUEDATE, will be done now with
- BPH126
18.12.2003 SH SCR5070 Added new argument BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT for
- PI.DATDAILYSTATEMENT (BPH102)
02.07.2003 SH SCR3912 Added new argument for BPH109 (Payments='P')
27.06.2003 SH SCR3868 Perform only updates to BADP if
not(BADP_BANK_CURRENCY <> GNRL_CURRENCY and CLNT108_ACC_CURR = GNRL_CURRENCY)
13.05.2003 SH SCR3517 Extended condition to book payment by administration
11.02.2003 SH SCR2936 Call BPH109 if BADP_FOREIGNPAYMENT = 'Y' and
- calculate BADP_AMOUNTHELLERCOSTSACCCURR
30.01.2003 RR modified Argumentlist for program BPH102
04.12.2002 SCR2650 Add new argument v.NPAYMENTS_PER_DATE to call BPH102
11.11.2002 SCR2503 Add 2 new arguments to list for BPH101
- v.TMPJ_AMOUNTDESKTOP and v.TMPJ_AMOUNTCREDIT
28.10.2002 SCR2440 SH Add BADP_BANKID, BADP_BANKACCOUNT and
-BADP_DATDAILYSTATEMENT to list of arguments for BPH101
24.09.2002 SH BPH223B Add tree new arguments for call of BPH102 at the end of li
- 3 times 0
19.09.2002 SH BPH223B Add tree new arguments for call of BPH102 at the end of li
- all will be skipped
18.09.2002 SH switch BPH101 to parameter and add all necessarily arguments to
the list of arguments, the changes of BADP fields in BPH101 will be now made in
this program (Problem: Error --> "Record has been updated")
10.09.2002 SH If payment has to be booked by department set BADP_ADMNOINITIAL
- and BADP_CLNTNOINITIAL = 0
04.09.2002 SH Add new argument for BPH102 v.JOURANLNO and store
- number in BADP_REPA_JOURNALNO
//29-08-2002 JP switch BPH224 to paramter and add BADT_BALDAILYSTATEMENT to list
15.08.2002 SH Add new argument for call to BPH101 "BADT_NPAYMENTSHANDLED",
- BPH101 will make updates to this field if some test in BPH101 are OK.
25.07.2002 SCR1744 SH Set BADP_TOBEPRINTEDFORCLIENT = 'Y' if
- COUT202_REPORTTYPE = 'DTA' or 'MT9'
17.07.2002 SCR1691 SH Add new parameter "PI.BADT_DAILYRUNNUMBER" to obtain
- table BADT with primary key and used as argument for diff. calls
26.03.2002 SH Made diff. changes according to new SPECS
// BPH 224 Final actions at BADT level
// sort on BADP_PAYMENTVALUEDATE
-- output parameters from BPH 101
-- for update TMPJ
-- Variables for Part 3
... in case of BADP_AMUNTACCCURR > 0 (=positive amounts)
... in case of BADP_AMUNTACCCURR < 0 (=negative amounts)
-- Part 3: Remaining payments can be booked as intercredit
... for positive amounts
... for negative amounts
-- Part 0: Check direct payment
-- Part1: Automatic ledger bookings
-- Automatic ledger bookings not possible
-- Part2: Payments which must be on the administration desktop
-- Part 3: Remaining payments can be booked as intercredit
... for positive amounts
... for negative amounts
.. store MQ113
-- Used as argument for GB902
-- Used as argument for BPH109
-- Calc REPA_JOURNALNO only once per group
-- Calculate bank costs
-- Calculate exchanged differences
-- Calculate client value date
-- Recalculate heller costs into client currency
-- Calcualte exchange difference
... update v.TMPJ_AMOUNTCREDITCURR here, before recalc via GB902 to update TMPJ_AMOUNTCREDIT
